name: Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer
overview: It's the storm to end all storms! Cold, wind, blowing snow - all conspiring to ruin that most magical of nights, Christmas Eve! Luckily, a young deer once dubbed a "misfit" has stepped up to save the day with the help of his shiny red nose - so shiny, in fact, you could even say it glows. All it took was one request: "Rudolph, with your nose so bright, won't you guide my sleigh tonight?" Based on the classic stop-motion Christmas special, Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer allows one or two players to play a series of four mini-games based on situations in the special: • Holiday Helper - The player(s) bounce presents, lights, stockings, dolls and toys where they belong: either under or on the Christmas tree, or into Santa's sleigh. • Toy Maker - The player(s) paint toys. • Cookie Cooking - The player(s) attempt to bake cookies for Mrs. Claus. • Saving Christmas - Playing as elves, the player(s) drop toys onto houses. In the first three games, the players can choose to be Rudolph, Clarice, Hermey, Yukon Cornelius, or Santa Claus; however there is no difference between characters. Each mini-game is timed, and once time is up, the mini-game is over.
